Parameter.Name: jsonDictionary
Parameter.Abstract: the dictionary representing the underlying object to wrap

Parameter.Name: type
Parameter.Abstract: the object type name, in the form namespace:typename

Parameter.Name: image
Parameter.Abstract: the image property for the object

Parameter.Name: url
Parameter.Abstract: the url property for the object

Parameter.Name: anotherObject
Parameter.Abstract: the FBGraphObject to compare it against

Token.Abstract: @abstract This property signifies that the current graph object is provisioned for POST (as a definition for a new or updated graph object), and should be posted AS-IS in its JSON encoded form, whereas some graph objects (usually those embedded in other graph objects as references to existing objects) may only have their "id" or "url" posted.

@abstract This property signifies that the current graph object is provisioned for POST (as a definition for a new or updated graph object), and should be posted AS-IS in its JSON encoded form, whereas some graph objects (usually those embedded in other graph objects as references to existing objects) may only have their "id" or "url" posted.

Parameter.Name: aKey
Parameter.Abstract: name of the property to return

Parameter.Name: anObject
Parameter.Abstract: the new value of the property

Parameter.Name: aKey
Parameter.Abstract: name of the property to set

Parameter.Name: aKey
Parameter.Abstract: name of the property to remove
